website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable full-coverage briefs that are made with curvaceous, full figures in mind.
pros: Made of quality cotton that's soft and breathable
Gusseted structure provides a comfortable fit that doesn't "ride up."
Full-coverage structure isn't detectable under most clothing
cons: May shrink when washed, especially in hot cycles
Sizes tend to run a bit small

customer_reviews.title: Quality is way down!
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder of the same underwear. But they are not the same at all. Quality has gone way down. They are cut smaller, elastic is cheap and stiff, fabric is thinner. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: J Schenker

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell!
customer_reviews.text: First time I got Briefs by Jockey, I bought these before I was about to get a c section and was looking forward to using them to ease on my pain and recovery. However, I was VERY disappointed! The moment I opened the bag there was a horrible sulfur like smell from the fabric. I washed them several times with different detergents, air dried them but it was no use. Since I have very sensitive skin, Jockey underwear are the only ones I wear, This never happened to me before, the odor problem was a complete surprise to me and a big issue. A total waste of money since they are going to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Nitza

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Right out of package 1 of 3 briefs has brown spots on back.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Full Coverage
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are amazing! 100% cotton with covered elastics. Comfy and offers full coverage. They cover up about an inch above the belly button and fully covers the behind too. Sizing is very accurate though I suggest going to the manufacters website and looking at the chart that includes waist measurements. Being 100% cotton this isn't going to have a slimming effect though if you find it too baggy around the mid section give it a good hot wash and high heat dry and it should shrink up a smidgen.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite As Well Made As In Years Past
customer_reviews.text: I have this same style brief, in many colors (which I purchased about four years ago). The panties I received today are no where near as plush as the ones purchased a few years ago. The cotton is very thin. One pair even had an incompletely sewn seam. I wanted to love these as much as I do the original ones I own. However, I am disappointed in the direction the quality of Jockey, has taken.
customer_reviews.author: Disneyjoy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, too thin & too small
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this exact product before and was very pleased. When I opened the package I was immediately aware that the ‘thread count’ on the fabric was a problem. The fabric is super thin. When I tried them on, they were super tight - not my experience with the previous purchase. And no, I haven’t gained weight. The elastic is also less ‘stretchy’... all told: Jockey product has gone way downhill. I won’t buy again! AND - when I looked at returns... nope!
customer_reviews.author: K MCK

customer_reviews.title: IMPOSTER
customer_reviews.text: NOT JOCKEY! Been wearing Jockey, size 8 cotton, for over 45 years years. These fit like a 6, and are scratchy!
customer_reviews.author: Alene Wisnevsky

customer_reviews.title: Shrink fit
customer_reviews.text: Since I have been buying jockey briefs for many years, I know how they always shrink to just the right size. There is significant shrinkage, so when you decide on a size, take that into account. Otherwise, I love the way they feel, all cotton softness.
customer_reviews.author: J. MCDERMOTT

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Chemical Smell!
customer_reviews.text: This was a re-order of the Jockey Elance Brief. I had purchased some a couple of years ago and was pleased with the fit and quality. However, after purchasing three packs of the same (which was not cheap), I opened them all to find a terrible chemical smell. I don't recall this happening before. I thought it would be solved by laundering them; it wasn't. I've tried soaking them. It helped somewhat, but the smell is still present. In addition to this, the sizing is way, way off. Some pairs are extremely long, and some are "normal". Beware of purchasing these. They are unwearable!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: These will last awhile
customer_reviews.text: The band is covered, but it's thin so it can bind a little; the cotton feels good and the underwear is comfortable, the fit around the legs is great and there's no tag...my opinion is they are worth the money and I will be buying more as long as the cotton quality holds out. These are thinner than the cotton underwear they made when I was young, but they still do the job.
customer_reviews.author: OntChee

customer_reviews.title: Jockey - why has your quality gone down?
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these for years but lately they've sprung holes after a few wears. They seem to be made of thinner, cheaper cotton. Also, the stitching is off. The elastic is showing through when it's supposed to be covered. That's right out of the package when they're supposed to be new. This is the second package with these issues. Made in India.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brief.  No tweet, no text,  no hashtag.  JUST A PERFECT BRIEF!
customer_reviews.text: As much as I dislike the topic of undergarments, these Jockey brand are very comfortable. They do not ride up. After wearing them for 40 years I feel comfortable in making that affirmation. Don’t mistake my words now, I haven’t worn the same pair of undergarments for 40 years, I have been wearing this brand for 40 years, I feel that I have significant knowledge whether they ride up or not. You can’t be too careful now a days with all the misspoken, misinformation, disinformation, conspiracy theories and hoaxes going around, I wanted my answer to be clearly understood. NO RIDING UP!
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: FAR EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS!!
customer_reviews.text: Was buying cotton briefs at a large chain store, and I was constantly having to pull them up. The Jockey plus size Elance brief are simply the greatest. I do not have to pull them up all the time, the stretch is just wonderful and it does not even feel like I have them on. They fit wonderfully. And I am washing them by hand...only takes a very few moments, place on a towel to dry and they are good as new. I will be purchasing another package this next month as all my old stretched out panties are going in the trash. These Jockeys are more money but very well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great Panties for Many Reasons
customer_reviews.text: These are serious panties with a great fit and wonderful construction. They last for years ~ no kidding. They wash and dry like a dream and hold their shape. I like that the elastic is covered (so no pinch-y elastic marks on my skin) and the fabric is so, so soft cotton. These panties are not for seduction, but under my jeans or skirt on a windy day, I feel totally confident.
customer_reviews.author: Cancer Survivor

customer_reviews.title: Different sizes and faded color in a package of underwear
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Jockey before, and so far no problem. But this time, I ordered two pairs of size 6 underwear, but the three of the them are all of different size, they are labeled as size 6. Besides the purple one, after one wash it's color started fading and stain the other ones. I included photos that show the product I received. I am really dissapointed with jockey.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Rough Fabric this Time.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for years and years and have always liked the softness of the fabric. However, the fabric of my most recent order felt almost rough. All of the others have had an actual size (etc.) tag but these arrived with the 'tag' imprinted inside. Makes me wonder if that process has anything to do with the change in, or lack of, softness. (Of course I have no idea if that's even possible.) I've washed them a couple of times hoping to soften them but no luck. Not sure what I'll do when it's time to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Wilson

customer_reviews.title: No exposed elastic
customer_reviews.text: Does not cause elastic irritation or excess sweatiness from an overuse of unnatural fibers. Colors are plain but fine for me. The fit is decent but I had already ordered up a size based on a look at existing reviews and they seem a little snug. Since my weight hasn't changed between underwear purchases, I'm guessing these just run smaller than the other brands I have purchased in the past. I will definitely buy again, keeping the sizing in mind for a bit of a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cola B

customer_reviews.title: Looove these!
customer_reviews.text: These panties are great! They do look huuuge. But they are granny panties. The fabric is thicker and looks long-lasting. They really give full coverage- leg holes aren't too big, crotch is perfect width (most too narrow) and they sit at your true waist. These are really nice quality underwear. Not gonna bother with the cheaper brands anymore. I found XXl is size 9.
customer_reviews.author: Emrs

customer_reviews.title: Good basic panties.
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, but the length from crotch to waistband is really long so they come up to at or above your waist. Jockey could shorten the length and it would be more flattering, maybe just below the natural waist? Soft cotton, pretty colors and prints, covered elastic waist and leg holes, so elastic doesn’t touch your skin. I wish Jockey would make available more size 9-10 in the bikini and string bikini, low rise brief and hipster styles.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: design change, false advertising, sad
customer_reviews.text: The product had a new package design that says package design is new but the product is the same. It is not. Comparing old and new in the same size: the new ones are cut with a narrower waist, longer rise, and longer crotch. They now bind, and the old comfort and freedom are gone. Purchasing a larger size results in a drooping crotch. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High waisted granny pants style
customer_reviews.text: These sit squarely at my waist or even above my waist and run a little large so not what I was expecting or what I wanted. They looked very " granny pants" to me , the opposite of even a hint of sexy, but the quality is nice . If you want very high waisted undies, and not a bit of even a modest bikini look, then this is the style for you. Too much trouble to return so I'll be wearing them anyway, trying to turn down the waists since I haven't had undies this high waisted since I was ten. All that coverage maybe will be warmer in the winter :-)!
customer_reviews.author: getupandgo

customer_reviews.title: Holes in them after washed
customer_reviews.text: These panties got holes in them after they were washed. They cannot be returned because they were worn. Who knew that Jockey product would have to be trashed. They don’t even deserve 1 Star.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Different from previous Jockey
customer_reviews.text: These undies are cut without room for hips. I've always gotten Jockey and in fact bought some a couple months ago from Macy's and they are fine. This is the second batch from Amazon like this. These are an odd cut and smaller than others. I always wash clothing before wearing it and did that with these and wore a pair, then tried another. I won't buy Jockey again from Amazon. Disappointed. Amazon usually has things that work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Seasalt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is my regular size and brand but when I washed them, they shrunk. Usually buy in a store. Assume they are non returnable as they are a personal item and have been washed. Need to say they run small...disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Really High Rise
customer_reviews.text: These are thin, very soft, and comfortable. However they fit very odd on me and go way up above navel. The seat is fine, a little big, but way alot higher than I am used to. I usually wear a size 10 in Hanes so I was surprised at the fit. Maybe I should've tried smaller size? They do not shrink when washed either. Very comfortable, but don't like the high rise under the breasts.
customer_reviews.author: TBurke

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some grandma style comfortable underwear with full coverage. These are made very well and will last a while. Love the material it's very soft. I purchased a size up (size 8 XXL) to allow for some shrinking being that I put these in the dryer. They are bigger than I expected but have already shrunk in the first wash and dry. They still feel a little loose but still very comfortable which is what I was mainly looking for. Ordered a second pack being that 3 come to a package. Some might think they are a little expensive for 3 underwear but they are definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Soni

customer_reviews.title: Never again!
customer_reviews.text: I'll never buy anymore. The first set I ordered were beautifully made, the second set has a bobbin thread that cuts into my skin and the top row of elastic has a Raw edge & is not covered with a hem. I was duped. I had to throw them all away and they are very expensive. I'm so disappointed, because I really loved how comfortable they were
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a long time wearer of JMS cotton briefs and been happy with them. However, they've become a bit more skimpy in their sizing lately. The last pack I purchased, same size as previously bought, was definitely smaller that what I currently had. So, I thought I'd give these Jockeys a try despite their more pricey cost. WOW! So comfortable! These are very soft, sized better and the material thicker than the cheaper JMS. I'm a convert!
customer_reviews.author: SLE328

customer_reviews.title: Sizing?????
customer_reviews.text: I recently lost a lot of weight and needed to purchase new underwear. I used the size chart and technically I should wear size 6 but I purchased size 7 so they would be a little loose. They are extremely tight and constricting. They measure 13 inches across the waistband before stretching. I'm so completely disappointed. These used to be my favorite underwear and now I don't know where to go. I'm size L/12 in clothing but apparently I'm still plus sized in underwear. I can't return them because they are underwear, I wasted a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Door Cottage

customer_reviews.title: These used to be my "go to" work knickers. ...
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my "go to" work knickers. The fabric seems a thinner, cheaper quality. The front panel is already tearing from the in two crotch in two places after one, yes, one wear. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: JChicago

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It seems it's very difficult to buy nowadays what I have been used to wearing all my life - 100% cotton underwear (preferably light pink) which fits comfortably. I will say that the elastic in waist and the leg openings are covered very nicely and no rough edges. I haven't washed them yet, so I will update if there is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin Fabric
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Jockey underpants for decades. This last purchase is very disappointing - although they are well made and comfortable I see that they are now made from very thin (likely cheaper) fabric. I don’t think this will last as long as their previous product did.
customer_reviews.author: S. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are 'granny pants' but they have good coverage and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: islandgirl1056

customer_reviews.title: Seemed too large
customer_reviews.text: I gained weight so I thought I needed a queen size since I had grown out of my underwear. So I tried something different. The fit was too large for me. Also I wasn’t pleased with the material, as I was used to a silky underwear. These are more cottony. The leg bands seemed tight. I really should’ve ordered a regular size and a low rise instead of a brief. My preference, my mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Timm

customer_reviews.title: Jockey Makes Great Briefs For Plus-Sizes
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing Jockey brand underwear for years. The quality can't be beaten and they fit especially well for plus sizes. The elastic band at the waist and legs are well covered and the wash/wear durability lasts. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sstoj

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. There is nice coverage over your bottom and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. There is nice coverage over your bottom and the legs don't ride up in the back. The fabric covered leg elastic is comfortable for summer and doesn't cut into your skin. The fabric is much thinner than it used to be years ago when I first started buying them. They need to be replaced more often. It would be great if they'd use heavier fabric again but then we wouldn't have to buy them as often so they wouldn't make so much money off of us. Oh well. All in all, very nice undies!
customer_reviews.author: J. D. S.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I knew there would be shrinkage so I bought them a size larger than I wear. They are 100% cotton after all. After washing and drying, they are a perfect fit. I just ordered for the second time. Used to purchase these in a local dept. store but I can't always find these now. Happy I found them on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little more expensive (at first) than what you could get at Walmart or Target, but they are really well made. Even as cheap as I am I think they're a really good deal. They'll last 10x longer, so are cheaper in the long run. Pretty, too. And the fit is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Sherilyn

customer_reviews.title: Best fit and feel ever
customer_reviews.text: The name, Elegance is well suited to this line of women's Jockey undies. I have previously bought standard bargain brands with standard results. When I first unpacked the product, appeared to be small. In truth the fit was just right. I purchased with confidence after reading consistent reviews. I have a plump bum but not so big thighs. The Elegance Women's Briefs hug my leg without creeping up or being to tight. Very pleased with the quality of material and the comfort of waist and legs. Especially grateful for the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Barbour

customer_reviews.title: You will love these
customer_reviews.text: True to size and just like the ones you find at Kohl’s or other department stores. Jockey is one of my favorite brands for underwear and I’m pleased you can now order them on Amazon. You can’t go wrong with this product. They are well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Should be listed as high-waisted
customer_reviews.text: These briefs are good quality and wash well however, they come up over my belly button. They really should be listed as high-waisted briefs. Based on the picture and descriptions, I expected them to fit somewhere UNDER the belly button and above the hips. Was hoping for these to become my new everyday undies but because they come up so high & show under most of my pants, I only wear them under dresses.
customer_reviews.author: J Bat

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality sewing.
customer_reviews.text: The waistband is smooth all around the top except for where it ended and there is big knot on the right side. Can feel that knot where they finished the waistband when wearing. Not as good quality, just because of the way they are sewn, as the last ones I bought of the same style. For the price I think they could have done a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I don't find it cool or sexy or desirable to have my underwear parked ...
customer_reviews.text: Thankful there is still a company making underwear that actually COVERS your bottom. I don't find it cool or sexy or desirable to have my underwear parked half-way up my buttocks. I just say yesterday on Lane Bryant a pair that stops just below the hip and has a stiff RUFFLE sticking out. Can you imagine if men had to endure this?
customer_reviews.author: Just Fine

customer_reviews.title: shrunk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased according to the size chart, but they shrunk in the dryer
customer_reviews.author: Emanon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing comfort for curvy women!
customer_reviews.text: These undies are great for curvy women! Their comfortable, wash very well, do not ride up, and provide great support. I find it hard to wear anything else after buying these lol! They may not be the prettiest of underwear designs, but they sure are the most comfortable! I have 9 pair in different colors, and they do fit true to size, just measure properly :)
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love 100% Cotton
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. 100% cotton briefs. No exposed elastic -- waist and leg openings have the elastic self covered with the fabric the briefs are made of. They fit great and are very comfortable. They have excellent coverage. The fabric is soft and not lightweight. The only thing that could make them better is if they were made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: romperstompers

customer_reviews.title: So-so product and inconsist size.
customer_reviews.text: The size of this product varies from one scale to another (for example 7-8) is a huge change. The quality of the product is just OK. Also comparing with other vendor, this same product is delivered much delay and charge fee for a return. I will not order from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase
customer_reviews.text: i like 100 % cotton undies. This are just what i wanted. So, I bought 3 more this time. I don't like clingy underwear that makes me feel sweaty or feel tight around the waist or hips. Plus, my doctor told me to buy extra large underwear for medical reasons. These fit the bill. They don't shrink alot when washed.
customer_reviews.author: Hummerlady

customer_reviews.title: it was a quality product but it changed and I switched to Jockey because a co worker told me they were the best and she was right
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear Fruit of the Loom underwear. Once upon a time, it was a quality product but it changed and I switched to Jockey because a co worker told me they were the best and she was right. Jockey, by far, is the best quality and best fitting and I will not buy any other brand. They fit just as expected and stay that way wash after wash.
customer_reviews.author: Powder2010

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a great under pant love these jockey briefs.
customer_reviews.text: Love these panties. Cotton is great. Love that leg and waist opening are completely covered in cotton. I am 75 and 175# 5 foot 2 inches. I ordered the size 9 came back and ordered size 10. Both fit ok but I decided 10 was a bit more comfortable in summer. I live in the south and it is very humid here
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Jockey Products!
customer_reviews.text: I love Jockey briefs and have worn them for years! They've changed the fabric, so I was worried at first. But I loved these even more! Great new fabric, softer and stretchy! Very nice, I'm getting more in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Starlight

customer_reviews.title: Good quality-Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn this style of ladies’ plus size brief for many years. They last forever. The encased elastic at the waist and legs makes them very comfortable. The cotton fabric is more substantial and better quality than Jockey’s brand name competition found in brick & mortar discount stores. Yes, these are pricey but you’ll get a lot more life out of them than going cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: LindaKTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable undies I’ve had in a long time
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: I love this style of Jockey Women's Underwear
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of Jockey Women's Underwear. It fits well and the elastic waistband is covered. I find the type of underwear where the elastic waistband sits directly on your skin very irritating. I don't know if I would call it an allergy to the elastic but it does irritate my skin. With the elastic covered as is the case with this style, I feel like I'm not wearing any underwear at all...they are just so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl K. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: These are great fitting and so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are great fitting and so comfortable. This style and Jockey brand are hard to find in the department store. If you can even find a department store these days. I've been wearing Jockey for years. They last through washing week after week.
customer_reviews.author: cooking girl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable purchase I could make and the fit is perfect! They arrived quickly and were exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lutes

customer_reviews.title: Not true to sizing of other Jockey cotton briefs
customer_reviews.text: These are not true to sizing of other Jockey cotton briefs. I bought the same size briefs here that I bought in the store. These are MUCH larger! I thought that maybe they would shrink if I put them in the dryer. WRONG!!! They're like granny pants! So, if you want briefs that don't shrink with washing, buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Bower

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Should have ordered a 7 instead of a 6. Runs small. Being allergic to latex, I wear them inside out because where the waistband seam is sewn the elastic is slightly exposed. Will order a larger size next time.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M.

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't properly read the description of this product when I purchased it. I don't like 100% cotton underwear but these are still comfortable to wear on days I just don't care if I'm wearing 100% cotton underwear. Jockey makes really nice undies but I prefer the Elance line with spandex in the materials.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sadowski,

customer_reviews.title: Different sizes in package
customer_reviews.text: The gray fit perfectly but the other colors run small even though it says they are all the same size. Jockey was once a good product....I guess they are made in china now too.
customer_reviews.author: 2 Old Texan's

customer_reviews.title: Great briefs
customer_reviews.text: I have used this exact style and size of Jockey brief for over 5 years. They are pricey but the cotton is of a good quality and the elastic is covered. They last a long time. I would recommend them. And I will buy them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LAHDC

customer_reviews.title: my go-to undies for many years
customer_reviews.text: The cotton is comfortable and breathes, the fit is good, and the elastic around the legs is wrapped in cotton so there's no elastic rubbing there. They last well. Not sexy but dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Donna McMaster

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing these for 20 years. No, they’re not exactly cute. But they are just unbelievably comfortable for big girls like me. They hold up incredibly well in the laundry. I only wear cotton underwear. Breathable and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I assumed for the price they would have a nice thick band around the waist. Instead the elastic around the waist and legs were the same, thin. It feels like you’re putting on granny panties, no offense to granny’s. Was just surprised because of the Jockey label and price. I should have read the description better.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Mc

customer_reviews.title: Have worn these for years
customer_reviews.text: First, I have purchased size 7 in this style for years from the local Jockey outlet. We now live too far from it so I decided to try Amazon. Size 7 was WAY too large. Returned them for size 6, which is perfect (in other clothing I wear size 10 or medium). With my long-waisted body type these briefs are wonderful. Any style with a lower waist band brings out the muffin top. Wonderfully soft cotton that also covers the comfortable waist band and leg elastic. Have purchased these for years and they are truly durable. My only caution would be that they are sized for slim-to-average thighs.
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Fray after one wash.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these regularly in the past because of sensitivity to elastic. Previous pairs lasted years before fraying. The last two packs (various colors) I ordered are not up to the previous quality. The cotton covering the rubber bands in the waist and legs wore through after just one or two washes. Will be looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: cmh

customer_reviews.title: Just cotton, fabric covered waist and leg elastic - good for allergies and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Just cotton with fabric covered elastic waistband and leg openings - key for skin sensitive/allergic to elastic components. Full cut, launder well with little to no shrinkage.
customer_reviews.author: libcat11

customer_reviews.title: Way to big
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cause I use to wear Jockey years ago. I went by the size guide and they were way to big. I am a short fat woman and these came up an inch or more past my belly button. Felt like I was wearing my grandmothers bloomers so If you buy check a size smaller and you might get lucky.
customer_reviews.author: demeter1957

customer_reviews.title: 2nds ? Not like my other jockeys
customer_reviews.text: Been a jockey girl all my life, but these are cheap feeling, like REALLY CHEAP cotton isn’t like any of my old ones it’s way light and has almost ripped already
customer_reviews.author: Katprints Photography

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is incorrect.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing jockey underwear for about 25 years. I have worn a size 8 for many years and I have not gained weight. . I ordered these in a size 8 and after one washing, the elastic was too small around the leg. Very disappointed in the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Red Dog

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE - Just Wish they had Size 7, so had to Buy Size 8, which is a little large
customer_reviews.text: I really want COMFORTABLE FULL FIT briefs, especially with comfortable bands at leg openings. THIS BRAND HAS THAT COMFORT. But they only have ONE unappealing 'MULTI' COLORS SET for Size 7, which would be perfect if I could get them in black.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover from HB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Only panties ill ever purchase are from Jocky comfortable, good cotton material, and last wash after wash
customer_reviews.author: urshurt

customer_reviews.title: Mrs. Santa wears granny panties!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these are the only style, type and brand of panties Mrs. Santa ever wears because a) the elastic on the waist and legs is covered (much more comfortable than exposed elastic); b), the cotton is high quality; c) they wash beautifully and d) last a long time. How could it get any better than that? (And they're white to blend in with the snow here at the Pole if Santa and I feel frisky.)
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Santa

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice, and well made. Appreciate the sewn fabric bound seams, no elastic touching the body. Bought for my daughter. Fit her well (size11). Not washed or worn yet. Will submit subsequent review.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Jockey Elance Briefs
customer_reviews.text: I find the quality of the product is less each time I purchase them. I had purchased the elance for years because the elastic is covered---allergic to elastic. Over the years, the material has become less durable which is very disappointing because I have really liked this Jockey product. I would rather pay a bit more to obtain a little higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable supportive.
customer_reviews.text: Jockey has been the only manufacturer I have found over the years for Cotton underwear. I pay the price because I have no choice. However they last a long time and are very durable through the washings. I recommend not using the dryer for even longer wear. I only wish other companies would do the same. Skin sensitivities lace, nylon, spandex, and allergies to colors are never fun. I could never wear those weird underwear they make for women and girls. They just fall down. Even Victoria's Secret has failed to continue a decent cotton seamless minimum panty, and bras that are comfortable for working women.
customer_reviews.author: Home Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: I like the colors, the fit, and the strength of the fabric. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fox, Author

customer_reviews.title: My Regular Brand now
customer_reviews.text: I hate the colors of multi-pack underwear I usually grab at Target. So I shopped online and found these, and now they're my one and only. They're the only underwear I wear under my inevitable black dress pants. I like the fit and the styling, very comfortable. The annoying brightly colored ill cheapos? I wear them when I go abroad and just throw them away as I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Ann Sherman

customer_reviews.title: superb underwear
customer_reviews.text: I love these underwear! The covered elastic really sells it for me, because I don't like to have anything but cotton next to my skin. They fit well around my old saggy butt and are super comfortable,
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Webster

customer_reviews.title: Are you the sensitive sort?
customer_reviews.text: If you or someone you know has a sensitivity to the elastic that is usually around the waist and leg openings of panties, these are a godsend. All of the elastic components are covered with cotton. The brief style offers full coverage without any riding up or twisting. They can be washed in extra hot water and dried in a dryer at a hot setting without any damage to the garment. Very well made and they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonOnTheLakes

customer_reviews.title: Odd Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these before and they fit perfectly. This time they run a bit tight and the leg opening is higher than before. Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lottalaffs

customer_reviews.title: size inconsistent with other jockey underwear
customer_reviews.text: These briefs are ginormous. The size is inconsistent with other jockey underwear I own. Wish I could've returned them
customer_reviews.author: HKW

customer_reviews.title: Favorite panties of all
customer_reviews.text: These are the ultimate in size, comfort and durability. I tossed all other brands in the trash. These panties last longer than any other brands. The covered waist band feels like you are wearing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Staria

customer_reviews.title: Jockey Women's Underwear So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For many years I have been wearing Jockey and they seem to never wear out. Several Pair of my white ones were beginning to look a little dingy so decided to get some new ones even though I probably could have bleached the old and they would have been good as new. So happy that I was able to get the same comfortable fit and in such lovely colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable panties
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite panties. They launder perfectly. Very comfortable. Some would call them “granny panties”. Not sexy but very practical. I will be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Some of the longest lasting women's briefs available on the market today
customer_reviews.text: Jockey briefs last ten times longer than the Hanes product which seems to dissolve after just a few months. For longest wear wash the briefs in lukewarm water. If you line dry your Jockey briefs they will last ten years or more. If that is not possible don't dry them in your dryer's highest setting. Use the warm setting --no more than that and less preferably-- and your briefs will last for many years even if you don't also wash them in lukewarm water.
customer_reviews.author: Priamsdaughter

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is all I ask for...and I receive  it with this brand...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this brand before and absolutely find them to be perfect for me.... I have tried so many others...and nothing even comes close to the confort I get from these...
customer_reviews.author: Philomena

customer_reviews.title: Good investment.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I have used them in the past. To me they were the same good quality, well sewn underpants as I have gotten in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia M.

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these at JC Penney's, but they didn't have them. I have been buying these for many years because they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Filby

customer_reviews.title: runs big
customer_reviews.text: same size as the other ones these are way bigger maybe because they are full panty.all cotton so they ride up bunch up under pants
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Woods

customer_reviews.title: Too tight and the material was nothing like the ones I had bought directly from Jockey
customer_reviews.text: A disaster. Too tight and the material was nothing like the ones I had bought directly from Jockey.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Oruna

customer_reviews.title: Beware of non-uniformity in size between colors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two 3-packs of Elance Brief size 9. One was a 3 pack of all black, another was a 3 pack of multiple colors. The black were smaller and tighter in the leg holes than the other colored pack. They were also much tighter than any of my previous orders of these underwear in this size over the last couple of years. So it appears that the sizing is no longer consistent between the different colors. Very disappointing! :(
customer_reviews.author: Retireddogmom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered these panties. I had tried another brand previously the panties of which did not hold up well. These appear to be better made and are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Dee C

customer_reviews.title: Tried a few other less expensive brands but returned those in favor of these.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 4 - 5 packages to replace old worn-out underwear. Although colors are limited in plus sizes, price is well below retail. Because I wash in hot water I bought a slightly larger size but so far, no shrinkage. Can't stand elastic against my skin and the waist- and leg bands are completely covered.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn K.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to recheck your order before placing it.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked the fact that I got cotton instead of microfiber, could have sworn I pushed the right button, apparently not. Disappointed that nobody offers a three pack of the beige color in either fiber, who wears white or pink anymore?? Kept them but will be more careful in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ednamae jones

customer_reviews.title: My fave underpants
customer_reviews.text: A while back I ordered a couple packs of these in black and they quickly become my fave underpants. I am a plus size woman and as such have found that some underpants are problematic (they either don't stay in place throughout the day, or the elastic digs into my skin, etc, etc) but these are perfect - comfortable full coverage and stay in place all day. I just ordered another couple packs so I can toss some of my other older underpants that aren't as comfy as these. If you are a curvy or plus size woman looking for sturdy and comfortable full coverage panties, I recommend these highly.
customer_reviews.author: Ovi Blue

customer_reviews.title: Will never purchase panties online again!
customer_reviews.text: Not at all the size they claim! For $20+ I expect them to fit just as the ones I bought in the store ( same size) , but these I got from here are nothing like my others; very disappointing, and makes me angry!
customer_reviews.author: BAMAGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: They fit wonderfully, keep you cool and wash easily. What's not to love.
customer_reviews.author: SBSwann

customer_reviews.title: Jockey women’s underwear
customer_reviews.text: They are too granny panty for me. Jockey makes a similar Elance style but the thigh cut is higher, and they are my new favorite pair of underwear. These were just a little too constricting around my thighs and have very much a “brief” appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Best undies ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best undies ever. I am 5'5". 115 lbs. Size 5 is perfect and preshrunk. They are high rise, of course. The elastic is covered and so comfortable. They are no sexy lingerie -but nothing is sexier than comfort and the ability to move, run, jump, skip and hop:). I also like that they are made in India -the motherland of cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Keister

product_meta.title: Jockey Women's Plus Size Elance¿ Brief 3-Pack
product_meta.description: The Jockey® Elance® Brief women's underwear is made with pure cotton for complete comfort. This underwear sits at the natural waist for a comfortable fit with full coverage.
feature_bullets: 100% cotton. Machine wash and dry. Imported.
